title: Evaluating QB/WR/TE combine workouts, Henry Ruggs nearly breaks record (Football 2/28)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson from Indianapolis to break down the first slate of workouts from the NFL Combine. The guys discuss the new format (4:00), followed by the performance of the quarterbacks, focusing on Jalen Hurts (10:45), Justin Herbert (16:30), Jordan Love (19:00), Jacob Eason (22:10) and Jake Fromm (30:30). Then, Will and Ryan react to Henry Ruggs' blazing 40-yard dash (34:30), the top wideouts in this year's class (39:15), and the lack of strength among tight ends (54:00).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:subtitle: Who helped their draft stock on Thursday night and who suffered? Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson break down the QBs, WRs and TEs at the NFL Combine.
